scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && uv run alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:migrate:generate: cd backend && uv run alembic revision --autogenerate
scripts.db:migrate:create: cd backend && uv run alembic revision
scripts.db:migrate:status: cd backend && uv run alembic current
scripts.db:migrate:history: cd backend && uv run alembic history --verbose
scripts.db:migrate:downgrade: cd backend && uv run alembic downgrade -1
scripts.db:migrate:reset: cd backend && uv run alembic downgrade base && uv run alembic upgrade head
